name: undeflabs/UASECO
description: UASECO is a fork of the XAseco2/1.03 controller for Trackmania and has been overhauled to support the Modescript Gamemodes of Trackmania² in Maniaplanet and changed to run with PHP/7.x or newer.

authors.name: undef
authors.role: Project Leader, Core Developer, German Translations
